channel.title: Parent Programming
channel.description: The Podcast about Parenting in the Tech Industry

item.title: Episode 4 with Garth Braithwaite
item.description: Garth Braithwaite joins us to talk about parenting as a remote employee.

item.title: Episode 3 with Derick Bailey
item.description: Derick Bailey joins to talk about his kids and how fortunate he was to find a way to pursue his Entrepreneurship while being a parent of young kids. Find Derick at derickbailey.com, watchmecode.net and on Twitter at @derickbailey.

item.title: Episode 2 with Joel Taddei
item.description: Joel Taddei joins to talk about making the transition to the tech sector, finding time to be with kids and why it’s important to be with your kids, instead of your phone.

item.title: Episode 1 with Kent C. Dodds
item.description:
The inaugural episode with Kent C. Dodds; a parent, husband and programmer living in Utah. He hosts Angular Air, a live weekly video broadcast and podcast about AngularJS.

Kent talks about what it’s like to raise two young kids, going over the highs and lows of parenting. He also mixes in a little bit of “leaky abstraction” humor in regards to figuring out how to work with his children.

Have a listen:

item.title: A Very, Very Short History
item.description: Parent Programming’s first episode aired on June 4th and was a lot of fun. The response from listeners has been very positive and it’s great to share parenting stories across the tech industry.
